    • getAllValid

      List<ValidGraveyard> getAllValid()

    • getNearestGraveyards

      List<ValidGraveyard> getNearestGraveyards(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Returns a list of enabled, valid graveyards in the player's current world for which the player has permission, returned in order of proximity to the player's location.
      Parameters:
      player - the player whose location is used as the origin, and permissions are checked
      Returns:
      a list of graveyards that match the criteria

    • getMatchingNames

      List<String> getMatchingNames(String prefix)
      Retrieves a list of graveyard names that match a given prefix. Matches are case-insensitive, and match against stored searchKeys while treating spaces and underscores as equivalent.

      This method is used by command TabCompleter methods th return a list of graveyard names that match a partially completed name prefix.

      This is currently (11-Jul_2025) the only method that uses the SelectGraveyardNamesMatchingPrefix query.

      Parameters:
      prefix - the prefix to match
      Returns:
      List of Strings containing graveyard names matched by prefix

    • getMatchingKeys

      List<String> getMatchingKeys(String prefix)
      Get graveyard searchKeys that prefix match string
      Parameters:
      prefix - the prefix to match
      Returns:
      String collection of names with matching prefix

    • getUndiscoveredGraveyards

      Stream<ValidGraveyard> getUndiscoveredGraveyards(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Get undiscovered graveyards for player
      Parameters:
      player - the player for whom to retrieve undiscovered Graveyards
      Returns:
      Stream of Valid objects that are undiscovered for player

    • getUndiscoveredKeys

      Set<String> getUndiscoveredKeys(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender player)
      Get undiscovered graveyard keys for player
      Parameters:
      player - the player for whom to retrieve undiscovered Valid keys
      Returns:
      HashSet of Valid search keys that are undiscovered for player

    • saveAll

      int saveAll(Collection<ValidGraveyard> graveyards)
      Save all valid graveyard records to the datastore
      Parameters:
      graveyards - a Collection of valid graveyard records to be saved in the datastore
      Returns:
      the count of valid graveyard records successfully saved in the datastore

    • update

      Graveyard update(ValidGraveyard graveyard)
      Update a graveyard record in the datastore
      Parameters:
      graveyard - the graveyard record to be updated in the datastore
      Returns:
      the graveyard record stored in the datastore before being updated

    • update

      Graveyard update(ValidSearchKey searchKey, ValidGraveyard graveyard)
      Update a graveyard record in the datastore. Takes the existing graveyard search key as a parameter so that an existing graveyard may be updated even if it contains a new name and search key
      Parameters:
      searchKey - the search key for the existing graveyard to be updated in the datastore
      graveyard - the graveyard record to be updated in the datastore
      Returns:
      the graveyard record stored in the datastore before being updated

    • delete

      Graveyard delete(ValidSearchKey searchKey)
      Delete record
      Parameters:
      searchKey - display name or search key of record to be deleted
      Returns:
      Deleted graveyard record
